project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file and calculates the mean, median, and mode for the numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Read CSV file and load data
Validate user input for numerical columns
Calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Calculate median for specified numerical columns
Calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Display results of mean, median, and mode calculations
Write tests for all implemented functions
Execute tests to verify the correctness of the implemented features
